attributes.action: Ban the use of pesticides and other products containing neonicotinoids on crops.
attributes.additional_details: Neonicotinoids have been banned in the U.K. as an EU member since 2018 following studies which showed a link between the use of these products in farming and a decrease in bee reproduction when using these pesticides. Please roll over these protections in order to protect the bee population of the U.K. and avoid setting a precedent for other harmful products to be used in the future.
attributes.background: All products containing neonicotinoids such as thiamethoxam should be banned for use in the U.K. due to their detrimental effect on bees and other pollinators.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Overturn the decision to allow the use of neonicotinoid pesticides
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569214

Continue the ban on the use of Neonicotinoids
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563943
